cast.overview: In the future, the government maintains control of public opinion by outlawing literature and maintaining a group of enforcers, known as “firemen,” to perform the necessary book burnings. Fireman Montag begins to question the morality of his vocation…
cast.title: Fahrenheit 451

details.biography: Tom Watson was born on March 21, 1932 in Auchinleck, Strathclyde, Scotland as Thomas Welsh Watson. He was an actor, known for The Winter Guest (1997), Cardiac Arrest (1994) and Another Time, Another Place (1983). He was married to Joyce Bain. He died on August 18, 2001 in St. Andrews, Scotland.
details.name: Tom Watson
